meta.label: Export Relationships (Remote)
meta.description:
Create Neo4j relationships from a Dataiku Dataset.
Use when Neo4j is hosted on a different server than DSS..
Note that the nodes must have been created first.

outputRoles.name: outputFolder
outputRoles.label: Results Folder
outputRoles.description: Dataiku Folder storing the export log and results
